Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
cooldown=25 amount=7
local debris=game:GetService("Debris") local lasttrigger=sp:WaitForChild("LastTrigger") local handle=sp:WaitForChild("Handle") local check=true
function onEquipped(mouse) equipped=true local plr=game.Players.LocalPlayer if mouse~=nil and plr~=nil then local diff=tick()-lasttrigger.Value if diff>cooldown then mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" sp.Handle.Transparency=0 else mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" sp.Handle.Transparency=1 delay(cooldown-diff,function() if mouse then mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" sp.Handle.Transparency=0 end end) end mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() local chr=sp.Parent if chr and lasttrigger.Value+cooldown<tick() then local t=chr:FindFirstChild("Torso") local h=chr:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if t and h and h.Health>0 and check then check=false lasttrigger.Value=tick() mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" sp.Handle.Transparency=1 for i=1,amount do local m=Instance.new("Model") m.Name="Metatronic Spider" local p=sp.Handle:clone() p.Friction=.2 p.Name="Torso" p.Transparency=0 p.CanCollide=true p.CFrame=CFrame.new() local rd=Vector3.new((math.random()-.5)*15,(math.random()-.5)*5,(math.random()-.5)*15) p.Position=sp.Handle.Position+rd p.Velocity=rd p.Parent=m local he=Instance.new("Part") he.Name="Head" he.formFactor="Custom" he.Transparency=1 he.Size=Vector3.new(0,0,0) he.Parent=m local w=Instance.new("Weld") w.Name="Neck" w.Part0=p w.Part1=he w.Parent=p local h=Instance.new("Humanoid") h.MaxHealth=5 h.Health=5 h.WalkSpeed=20 h.Parent=m local ct=Instance.new("ObjectValue") ct.Value=game.Players.LocalPlayer ct.Name="creator" ct.Parent=m local s=script.Script:clone() s.Parent=m s.Disabled=false debris:AddItem(m,math.random(20,30)) m.Parent=game.Workspace p.Position=sp.Handle.Position+rd end wait(cooldown) sp.Handle.Transparency=0 mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" check=true end end end) end end
function onUnequipped() equipped=false sp.Handle.Transparency=0 end
sp.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) sp.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
damage=3 range=300
meshes={115977511,115975859} standingmesh=115973891 --Accidental mesh with no legs. Maybe someone wants it anyways -> 115975800
local head=sp:WaitForChild("Head") local hum=sp:WaitForChild("Humanoid") local torso=sp:WaitForChild("Torso") local mesh=torso:WaitForChild("Mesh") local ct=sp:WaitForChild("creator") local debris=game:GetService("Debris")
alive=true currentmesh=0 nextmove=0
torso.Touched:connect(function(hit) if hit and hit.Parent and hit.Parent.Name~=sp.Name and alive then local h=hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if h~=nil then local plr=game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hit.Parent) if plr then if plr==ct.Value then return end end for i,v in pairs(h:GetChildren()) do if v.Name=="creator" then v:remove() end end local newct=ct:clone() debris:AddItem(newct,1) newct.Parent=h h:TakeDamage(damage) end end end)
hum.Changed:connect(function(prop) if hum then if hum.Health<=0 then alive=false if torso then hum:remove() local f=Instance.new("Fire") f.Parent=torso if head then head:remove() end wait(4) end sp:remove() end else alive=false sp:remove() end end)
while alive do local t1,t2=wait(.1) if t2>nextmove then nextmove=t2+.5+math.random() closest=range target=nil for i,v in ipairs(game.Workspace:GetChildren()) do --targets every thing named humanoid that is in a model in workspace and is not another spide if v and v.className=="Model" and v.Name~=sp.Name then local t=v:FindFirstChild("Torso") local h=v:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if t~=nil and h~=nil and h.Health>0 then safe=false local plr=game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(v) if plr then if plr==ct.Value then safe=true end end if not safe then local mag=(t.Position-torso.Position).magnitude if mag<closest then target=t closest=mag end end end end end if target then point=target.Position+(Vector3.new(math.random()-.5,math.random()-.5,math.random()-.5)*6) --hum.WalkToPoint=point hum:MoveTo(point,target) if math.random()<.15 then hum.Jump=true end end end if torso and mesh then if torso.Velocity.magnitude>3 then currentmesh=currentmesh+1 mesh.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="..tostring(meshes[(currentmesh%(#meshes))+1]) else mesh.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="..tostring(standingmesh) end end end
